nodes.documentation:
XBR Payment/Paying Channel between a XBR data consumer and the XBR market maker,
or the XBR Market Maker and a XBR data provider.
nodes.name: XBRChannel

nodes.documentation:
Event emitted when payment channel is closing (that is, one of the two state channel
participants has called "close()", initiating start of the channel timeout).
nodes.name: Closing

nodes.documentation:
Event emitted when payment channel has finally closed, which happens after both state
channel participants have called close(), agreeing on last state, or after the timeout
at latest - in case the second participant doesn't react within timeout)
nodes.name: Closed

nodes.documentation: Split a signature given as a bytes string into components.
nodes.name: splitSignature

nodes.documentation: Verify close transaction typed data was signed by signer.
nodes.name: verifyClose

nodes.documentation:
Trigger closing this payment channel. When the first participant has called `close()`
submitting its latest transaction/state, a timeout period begins during which the
other party of the payment channel has to submit its latest transaction/state too.
When both transaction have been submitted, and the submitted transactions/states agree,
the channel immediately closes, and the consumed amount of token in the channel is
transferred to the channel recipient, and the remaining amount of token is transferred
back to the original sender.
nodes.name: close

nodes.documentation:
XBR Payment/Paying Channel between a XBR data consumer and the XBR market maker,
or the XBR Market Maker and a XBR data provider.
nodes.name: XBRChannel

nodes.documentation:
Event emitted when payment channel is closing (that is, one of the two state channel
participants has called "close()", initiating start of the channel timeout).
nodes.name: Closing

nodes.documentation:
Event emitted when payment channel has finally closed, which happens after both state
channel participants have called close(), agreeing on last state, or after the timeout
at latest - in case the second participant doesn't react within timeout)
nodes.name: Closed

nodes.documentation: Split a signature given as a bytes string into components.
nodes.name: splitSignature

nodes.documentation: Verify close transaction typed data was signed by signer.
nodes.name: verifyClose

nodes.documentation:
Trigger closing this payment channel. When the first participant has called `close()`
submitting its latest transaction/state, a timeout period begins during which the
other party of the payment channel has to submit its latest transaction/state too.
When both transaction have been submitted, and the submitted transactions/states agree,
the channel immediately closes, and the consumed amount of token in the channel is
transferred to the channel recipient, and the remaining amount of token is transferred
back to the original sender.
nodes.name: close

params.amount_: The amount of XBR held in the channel.
params.delegate_: The offchain delegate allowed to spend XBR offchain, from the channel,    in the name of the original sender.
params.marketId_: The ID of the XBR market this payment channel is associated with.
params.timeout_: The payment channel timeout period that begins with the first call to `close()`

close(uint32,uint256,bytes,bytes).notice: Trigger closing this payment channel. When the first participant has called `close()` submitting its latest transaction/state, a timeout period begins during which the other party of the payment channel has to submit its latest transaction/state too. When both transaction have been submitted, and the submitted transactions/states agree, the channel immediately closes, and the consumed amount of token in the channel is transferred to the channel recipient, and the remaining amount of token is transferred back to the original sender.

methods.constructor: Create a new XBR payment channel for handling microtransactions of XBR tokens.

verifyClose(address,address,uint32,uint2.notice: Verify close transaction typed data was signed by signer.

userdoc.notice: XBR Payment/Paying Channel between a XBR data consumer and the XBR market maker, or the XBR Market Maker and a XBR data provider.
